skill_e.tooltip:
Galio lunges forward with a mighty blow, dealing ? magic damage to the first champion and knocking him into the air for ? seconds. Enemies in the way take ? magic damage.

Galio will stop upon hitting terrain with Justice Punch.

skill_i.tooltip: Every few seconds, Galio's next basic attack deals bonus magic damage in an area.

skill_q.tooltip:
Galio fires two windblasts that deal ? magic damage.

When the windblasts meet, they combine into a giant tornado that deals ?% of enemies' maximum Health (max ? vs. monsters) as magic damage over ? seconds.

skill_r.tooltip:
Galio designates an allied champion's current position as his landing spot, granting all allied champions in the area Shield of Durand's magic damage shield for ? seconds.

When Galio lands, enemies in the area take ? magic damage and are knocked into the air for ? seconds.

skill_w.tooltip:
Passive: After not taking damage for ? seconds Galio gains a shield that absorbs ? magic damage.

First Cast: Galio starts to charge, gaining 20/25/30/35/40 (+?)(+?)% damage reduction from magic damage and ?% of that amount as damage reduction from physical damage. While charging, Galio slows himself by 15%.

Second Cast: Galio taunts nearby enemy champions for 0.5 to 1.5 seconds, deals ? (+?) to ? (+?) magic damage, and refreshes the damage reduction for 2 seconds. Taunt duration, damage, and radius increase with charge time.
